title: Earthquake!
description: A tremor shakes the mine, causing minor collapses. Rumblings continue. Workers begin to panic as dust fills the air. The men need instruction, and fast!

options.text: Shady - Forget the machines! We need to salvage food and water before anything else. If we don’t have supplies, none of us are making it through the week.
options.outcome: By prioritizing supplies, food stocks remain intact, but the mine’s damage worsens, and future repairs will be harder.

options.text: Old-Timer - If we don’t fix the machines now, we’re done for. We need power, we need infrastructure, and we need it fast. We can worry about the rest later.
options.outcome: The machinery is stabilized, but at great cost. Some workers are lost in the effort, and food stocks are disrupted in the chaos.

options.text: Beck - People come first! We can’t just leave anyone trapped under the rubble. Every second counts. If we don’t act now, lives will be lost.
options.outcome: The rescue effort saves many, but resources are strained. Some machinery is beyond repair, and food supplies take a hit.
